Description: A compact keyboard that connects via Bluetooth or USB receiver offering clutter-free typing and portability
A battery-powered mouse that eliminates cables while providing smooth and accurate cursor control
A high-performance keyboard with mechanical switches for faster response durability and better typing experience
A stand with built-in fans that improves airflow and prevents laptop overheating during heavy usage
A device that expands a single USB port into multiple ports for connecting peripherals
A portable storage device used for backing up files media and important data
A fast external solid-state drive offering high-speed data transfer and better durability than HDDs
A camera designed for video calls online classes meetings and live streaming
Headphones that reduce background noise for better focus and immersive audio
An adjustable stand that raises the laptop to eye level improving posture and comfort
An external display that provides a larger screen area for multitasking coding and design
